text: To the North of Katmandu is a 1986 British comedy movie. It was filmed in Katmandu, Nepal. ==Story== Max Boyce takes part in the 1985 World Elephant Polo Championships in Katmandu, Nepal. ==Actors== * Max Boyce * Barbara Bach * Billy Connolly * Ringo Starr ==Other websites== * Category:1986 comedy movies Category:British comedy movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies set in Nepal Category:Nepali culture
title: To the North of Katmandu
